title: Kill/Death ratio and win/loss on new client
body: Where can I find this stuff in the new client?? Is there any?

replies.body: You can still see your individual match K/D ratio on your profile page in the client, but we're working on bringing all those other stats over as well. We don't have a hard timeline for it, so be sure to check out our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) for any updates.
A lot of the detailed stats that were in the old client aren't in the new client but they said they were working on adding some of them back.
